2b11819261df0c8b59ff196bbdcc84fe4f19a521b2bba97ffd39df2325bb904","dweb:/ipfs/QmU8pFh196YFDhZCpQ4rSnVUUA6EAVoFHnVLbvLrq5qnWF"]},"contracts/interfaces/IStETH.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5a70bd9c7f58e2ffd8bde4444d358be2a58b40bb49282673591efcbf3d5a8dc7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5a1e32863741f5e7cb909d8b2fbd48f68d1d852f306b7736595becb774883a50","dweb:/ipfs/Qmcnh8Ujdb8zkWReUXADrfx4yopkB3YHj7dPm59iwozoFj"]},"contracts/modules/DegenerusGameJackpotModule.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9e540656514bb585baf6f4c4f5b9a2f2ba45e8a0f707726593a52dc6e7b98428","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7e5eb2886b3985c5d6778110ca029a1c15f118f716f9a24077e4361bd7576ed3","dweb:/ipfs/QmdQ14StgCL1Mj5rvaL4qGTavwP1zTcWv9rWv5mDtcA1dH"]},"contracts/storage/DegenerusGameStorage.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9b320af7aaad31d3f5e13494556defe6f486dcf1a3671bd00a968ea85722c495","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b7fa37b908354a14d763c71ed17ec8f16e79faa349b2fcf0dc37e3a5f164f74c","dweb:/ipfs/QmaU1JST3a9a38zPJrghofJrW8n6AtNLkQR7xvU5VNQ5yU"]},"contracts/test/JackpotGasHarness.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8c44775942b983dc4f2267c51b0394d421af482481b9da9210b158a5b3c2bd7f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://dc14ad8494c4167b283d82cd64eeee450d9510eab01c4e36ffdb2a6ceb47ff85","dweb:/ipfs/QmWZEcxjAwhuC3FqwPvybrYh8YiK1eBCJoRSEffiZk8JYn"]}},"version":1}

calcPrizePoolForLevelJackpot(uint24,uint.details: This is the "budgeting" function that determines how ETH flows between pools:      FLOW:      1. Merge nextPrizePool into currentPrizePool.      2. Compute rewardPool retention % based on level and RNG (higher at end of 100-level bands).      3. Adjust retention based on flip activity trends.      4. Split remainder into level jackpot (20-40%) and daily jackpot base.      5. On level % 100, optionally add yield surplus (stETH appreciation) to rewardPool.

params.stethAddr: stETH contract address for balance checks.

returns.effectiveWei: ETH allocated for the level jackpot.

payCarryoverExterminationJackpot(uint24,.details: After a trait is exterminated, this rewards players who already hold tickets for the      upcoming level. Funded from rewardPool at 1% (scaled by level position in 100-level band).      Also triggers a quest roll for the jackpot day.

params.lvl: Target level for ticket lookup (typically current level + 1).
params.traitId: The exterminated trait whose holders are rewarded.

payDailyJackpot(bool,uint24,uint256,addr.details: Called by the parent game contract via delegatecall. Two distinct paths:      DAILY PATH (isDaily=true):      - Distributes escalating slice of dailyJackpotBase to trait-based winners.      - Seeds next level's carryover jackpot from rewardPool.      - Queues MAP ticket distribution for a follow-up tx (if budgeted).      - Increments jackpotCounter; clears dailyBurnCount on completion.      EARLY-BURN PATH (isDaily=false):      - Triggered during purchase phase when early burns occur.      - Pays a rewardPool-funded slice once per week, starting 7 days after purchase phase begins        (1.5% of rewardPool; ~1% MAP, ~0.5% ETH).      - Coin jackpots pay on non-ETH days, sized from lastPrizePool.

params.coinContract: Coin module for COIN payouts and quest rolls.
params.isDaily: True for scheduled daily jackpot, false for early-burn jackpot.
params.randWord: VRF entropy for winner selection and trait derivation.

payExterminationJackpot(uint24,uint8,uin.details: Called when a trait is being exterminated. All four bucket slots use the SAME trait ID      so that only holders of the exterminated trait can win. Uses daily jackpot share/bucket      sizing but draws exclusively from the single trait's ticket pool.

params.coinContract: Coin module (unused for ETH-only extermination jackpots).
params.ethPool: ETH allocated for this extermination jackpot.

payLevelJackpot(uint24,uint256,uint256,a.details: The flagship jackpot with 60/13/13/14 share distribution. Uses the "main" flow which      supports solo bond purchases (25% for single winners) and large-bucket bond distribution.      Unpaid ETH rolls into currentPrizePool for daily jackpots.

params.effectiveWei: Total ETH allocated for the level jackpot (from calcPrizePoolForLevelJackpot).
params.rngWord: VRF entropy for trait and winner selection.

payMapJackpot(uint24,uint256).details: Branches based on mapJackpotType:      - DAILY (1): Uses burn-weighted traits, splits winners across current + carryover levels.      - PURCHASE (2): Uses random traits, single draw for current level only.

processMapBatch(uint32).details: Called iteratively until all pending mints are processed. Uses a writes budget      to stay within block gas limits. The first batch in a new airdrop round is      scaled down by 35% to account for cold storage access costs.      GAS BUDGETING:      - Each mint requires ~2 SSTOREs (trait ticket + count update).      - Budget defaults to WRITES_BUDGET_SAFE (780) if not specified.      - Minimum budget is WRITES_BUDGET_MIN (8) to ensure progress.

params.writesBudget: Maximum SSTORE writes allowed this call (0 = use default).

returns.finished: True if all pending map mints have been fully processed.

calcPrizePoolForLevelJackpot(uint24,uint.notice: Computes and applies prize pool splits at the start of a new level's jackpot phase.

payCarryoverExterminationJackpot(uint24,.notice: Pays a post-extermination carryover jackpot for the NEXT level's ticket holders.

payDailyJackpot(bool,uint24,uint256,addr.notice: Pays early-burn jackpots during purchase phase OR rolling daily jackpots at level end.

payExterminationJackpot(uint24,uint8,uin.notice: Pays a trait-restricted jackpot during extermination phase.

payLevelJackpot(uint24,uint256,uint256,a.notice: Pays the level jackpot at the end of the purchase phase.

payMapJackpot(uint24,uint256).notice: Pays the queued MAP jackpot (daily or purchase) in a separate transaction.

processMapBatch(uint32).notice: Processes a batch of pending map mints with gas-bounded iteration.
